title: Obama's Years
description: Morning Edition host Steve Inskeep traveled across the country to explore how life has changed in the eight years Barack Obama has been in office — and also put the question to the President himself. Steve joins host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith to introduce "Obama's Years." More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
